title: Online Experiential Learning Design in Healthcare: Language Education Application in Asynchronous Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A process for applying experiential learning to medical language education in pandemic situations, emphasizing simulation and case-based activities to compensate for the lack of practical opportunities.

learning_goals: Learners can utilize specialized terminology with 80% or higher accuracy through medical-scenario-based language tasks.
Learners can recreate and reflect on feedback for patient-doctor conversation scenarios at least three times using online simulation tools.
Learners can achieve a score of 3 or higher on a 4-point scale (1â€“4) for language proficiency in medical contexts through a peer evaluation system.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
